parquet.avro

Class AvroReadSupport<T extends org.apache.avro.generic.IndexedRecord>

  • java.lang.Object
    • parquet.hadoop.api.ReadSupport<T>
      • parquet.avro.AvroReadSupport<T>

  • public class AvroReadSupport<T extends org.apache.avro.generic.IndexedRecord>
extends ReadSupport<T>
    Avro implementation of ReadSupport for Avro IndexedRecords which cover both Avro Specific and Generic. Users should use AvroParquetReader or AvroParquetInputFormat rather than using this class directly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class parquet.hadoop.api.ReadSupport
